---
title: "Palmer penguins report"
format: html
editor: visual
params:
  species: "adelie"
  island: "Torgersen"
---

## Full plot

```{r}
data <- targets::tar_read(data_trim, store = "modelling_store")
```

```{r}
#| eval: true
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(
  data,
  aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, color = species)
) + geom_point()
```

## `r params$species` plot

```{r}
#| eval: true

dplyr::filter(
  data,
  species == params$species
) |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, color = species)
    ) + 
  geom_point()
```
